metadata.title: CVE-2023-51847 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in obgm and Libcoap v.a3ed466 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via thecoap_context_t function in thesrc/coap_threadsafe.c:297:3 component.

criterions.comment: libcoap3 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
